Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary assignment of each user story to a sprint

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Select whether a feature is included in a release

Name: allocate_task_to_worker
Description: Assign a task to a specific worker

Name: set_sprint_number
Description: Choose the sprint index for scheduling

Name: set_story_points_for_user_story
Description: Set or adjust story points for a user story

Name: schedule_sprint_start_offset
Description: Days offset from project start to sprint start

Name: decide_blocker_resolution_flag
Description: Indicate whether a blocker is resolved

Name: set_team_size
Description: Decide the effective team size for a sprint

Name: set_velocity_target_story_points
Description: Target average story points per sprint

Name: plan_review_attendees_target
Description: Target number of attendees for sprint review
